prompt.content: Calculate Snowflake Inc. (NYSE: SNOW)'s EV/Sales multiple for the Fiscal year ended January 31, 2025. Show the enterprise value build-up and do not just pull the EV figure. Use the stock price from March 7, 2025, to calculate equity value. Format the final answer as "#.##x".

messages.content: [{"criteria":"Shares outstanding are found to be 334,100,000","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Share price used is $158.91"},{"criteria":"Equity value calculated = $53,091,831,000","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Operating lease liabilities, current = $35,923,000","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Operating lease liabilities, non-current = $377,818,000"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Convertible senior notes, net = $2,271,529,000"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Cash and cash equivalents = $2,628,798,000"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Short-term investments = $2,008,873,000"},{"criteria":"Long-term investments = $656,476,000","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Enterprise Value (EV) computed = $50,489,668,000","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Sales for FY2025 = $3,626,396,000"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"EV/Sales calculated = 13.92x"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Answer is formatted as \"#.##x\""}]
